tool_description: Directions, mapping and address information API
name: DirectAPI - Directions
title: DirectAPI - Directions

api_list.name: Autocomplete
api_list.description: Provides address suggestions as the user types

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: Radius in meters around the location

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for locations based on a text search

api_list.name: Directions
api_list.description: Get an optimized route through a set of 2 or more stops

required_parameters.name: stops
required_parameters.description: A list of pipe(|) separated stops. Each stop can be an address, a set of coordinates, or a Google place_id. You can specify an address as the starting or ending point of the trip by adding \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"start:\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" or \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"end:\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" before the address.
required_parameters.default: origin:1676 40th Street, Calgary, AB|3368 Heritage Drive, Calgary, AB|235 Heritage Drive, Calgary, AB|1956 Fourth Avenue, Calgary, AB|destination:785 7th Ave, Calgary, AB
